content.raw: Actually I think this error message is related to the depth image compression.  I believe `cv_bridge` is attempting to compress the depth image but it is unable to do so because the depth image is in 32 bit floating point which is incompatible with JPEG compression.  This would explain why the `front/depth/compressed` is not populated while `front/depth` is populated with data.
content.html: Actually I think this error message is related to the depth image compression. I believe cv_bridge is attempting to compress the depth image but it is unable to do so because the depth image is in 32 bit floating point which is incompatible with JPEG compression. This would explain why the front/depth/compressed is not populated while front/depth is populated with data.
